definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: weep, bewail (Ar. bakay, Aram. [[בְּכָא]], bk0, As. bakû Zim:BP 23, 56, Eth. bakaya:)—

weep (in grief, humiliation, or joy), abs. Ge 42:24, Ge 43:30, Ge 43:30, Ex 2:6, Nu 11:4, Nu 11:10, Nu 14:1, 1Sa 1:7, 1Sa 1:8, 1Sa 1:10, 1Sa 11:5, 1Sa 30:4, 1Sa 30:4, 2Sa 1:12, 2Sa 3:16, 2Sa 13:36, 2Sa 15:30, 2Sa 15:30, 2Sa 19:1, 2Sa 19:2, 2Ki 8:11, 2Ki 8:12, Is 30:19, Is 30:19, Je 41:6, Je 50:4, Ez Eze 24:16, Eze 24:23, La 1:2, Zec 7:3, Joe 1:5, Joe 2:17, Ps 78:64, Ps 126:6 cf. Ps 69:11 (but on text v. Che) Job 27:15, Ec 3:4 (opp. laugh [[שׂחק]]) Ezr 10:1, Ne 8:9, Es 8:3; once c. inanim. subj. Job 31:38 ´[[תְּלָמֶיהָ יִב]] its furrows weep; on Ne 1:4 [[יׇשַׁבְתִּי וׇאֶבְכֶּה]] cf. As.attašab abakî, Flood:130 ed. Dl Gu:§ 77 Hpt:BAS i. 145; of loud weeping [[נׇשָׂא]] ´[[הַקּוֹל וַיִּב]] Ge 21:16, Ge 27:38, Ge 29:11, Ju Jdg 2:4, Jdg 21:2, 1Sa 11:4, 1Sa 24:17, 2Sa 3:32, 2Sa 13:36, Job 2:12, Ru 1:9, Ru 1:14, cf. ´[[בְּאָזְנֵי י]] ´[[בּ]] Nu 11:18, also Job 30:31.

c. acc. cogn. [[בְּכִי]] Ju Jdg 21:2, 2Sa 13:36, 2Ki 20:3 = Is 38:3, cf. [[בִּבְכִי]] Is 16:9, [[מִבְּכִי]] Je 48:32, & [[חַרְבֶּה בֶּכֶה]] ´[[בּ]] Ezr 10:1; sq. [[קוֹל גׇּדוֹל]] 2Sa 15:33, cf. [[בקול גדול]] ´[[בּ]] Ezr 3:12; weep bitterly ´[[מַר יִב]] Is 33:7; also c. inf. abs. weep intensely, grievously 1Sa 1:10, Je 22:10, La 1:2, cf. Is 30:19 & Mic 1:10 (but on text v. supr.)

sq. [[עַל]] weep upon, i.e. embrace and weep, [[עַל־חואריו]] Ge 45:14, Ge 46:29 cf. Ge 45:15, Ge 50:1, also [[עַל־פָּנׇיו]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ki 13:14; v. further Ge 33:4, Ge 45:14 & [[וַיִּבְכּוּ אִישׁ אֶת־רֵעֵהוּ]] 1Sa 20:41; also sq. [[עַל]] weep over, for Ju Jdg 11:37, Jdg 11:38, 2Sa 3:34, La 1:16; sq. [[אֶלׁ־]] 2Sa 1:24, 2Sa 3:32, Ez Eze 27:31; sq. [[לְ]] Je 22:10, Je 48:32, Job 30:25; sq. [[מִפְּנִי]] because of  Je 13:17; sq. temporal clause (of occasion of weeping) Ge 50:17, Ps 137:1, Ne 8:9.
sq. [[עַל]] in sense of burden, annoy with weeping Nu 11:13, Ju Jdg 14:16, Jdg 14:17 cf. [[לִפְנֵי]] Nu 11:20.

´[[לִפְנֵי י]] ´[[בּ]] of penitent weeping Ju Jdg 20:23 (cf. Be; v. also Jdg 21:2) De 1:45, 2Ki 22:19, 2Ch 34:27, cf. also Nu 25:6; joined with fasting Ju Jdg 20:26, 2Sa 12:21, 2Sa 12:22, cf. Ezr 10:1; so of weeping in anxious entreaty Ho 4:5; on pt. as n.pr. Ju Jdg 2:1, Jdg 2:5 v. [[בּׂכִים]] infr.

definitions.body: Pt. fs. [[מְבַכָּה]] lament Je 31:25 sq. [[עַל]]; bewail, pl. [[מְבַכּוֹת]] sq. acc. Ez Eze 8:14.
